P1: Irrational investors is a snapchat group-chat where people who are interested in investing and trading gather to share their trading techniques, technical-analysis and investment tips.You do not have to be an expert in trading/investing to join - you just have to be interested in trading. We have all ranges of people, from newbies to seasoned professionals already working in the industry.
P2: We don't limit our conversation topics to just crypto and stocks, we're open to every financial topic - You can join and share your ideas about e-commerce, drop-shipping, property/retail, product flipping, and anything else that involves money!
